config: A huge thank you to everyone who participated in the Justia "Pixcel" Challenge. We were absolutely delighted to have received 16 submissions! Our competitors displayed a considerable amount of creativity, talent, patience, and authenticity. After tight voting, Laura Garc√≠a was granted the second place and awarded a $25 Amazon gift card.
